Class HDBManagerControl

Object
HDBManagerControl
public class HDBManagerControl extends Object
Control class that handles all business logic related to HDB Manager actions. This includes managing BTO projects, approving officer registrations, handling application decisions, and generating reports.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private BTOProjectRepo
    projectRepo
    Repository containing all BTO project data accessible to the manager.
    private final Scanner
    sc
    Scanner for reading user input during manager interactions.

  • Field Details

    • projectRepo

      private BTOProjectRepo projectRepo
      Repository containing all BTO project data accessible to the manager.

    • sc

      private final Scanner sc
      Scanner for reading user input during manager interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBManagerControl

      public HDBManagerControl()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(BTOProjectRepo pRepo)
      Initializes the control class by linking it to a BTO project repository. This must be called before invoking any manager-related operations.
      Parameters:
      pRepo - The project repository to associate with this controller.

    • handleCreateProject

      public void handleCreateProject(HDBManager manager)
      Handles the creation of a new BTO project by the manager. Delegates the creation logic to the project repository.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager creating the project.

    • handleEditProject

      public void handleEditProject(HDBManager manager)
      Allows the manager to select and edit one of their existing projects. Displays the list of projects, validates the selection, and delegates the editing logic to the project repository.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager editing their project.

    • handleDeleteProject

      public void handleDeleteProject(HDBManager manager)
      Allows the manager to delete one of their projects. Displays the list of projects, validates the selection, and removes the selected project via the repository.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager deleting their project.

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public void toggleProjectVisibility(HDBManager manager)
      Toggles the visibility of a project managed by the HDB manager. Displays the manager's projects and updates the visibility of the selected one.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager toggling project visibility.

    • viewAllProjects

      public void viewAllProjects()
      Displays all BTO projects available in the system, regardless of visibility or owner.

    • viewMyProjects

      public void viewMyProjects(HDBManager manager)
      Displays only the projects created by the given HDB manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager whose projects are to be viewed.

    • viewOfficerRegistrations

      public void viewOfficerRegistrations(HDBManager manager)
      Displays all officer registration requests associated with the manager's projects.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager reviewing officer registrations.

    • handleUpdateRegistration

      public void handleUpdateRegistration(HDBManager manager)
      Handles the approval or rejection of pending officer registration requests for the manager's projects. On approval, assigns the officer to the project and decrements the number of available officer slots.
      Parameters:
      manager - The HDB manager processing officer registrations.

    • viewApplications

      public void viewApplications(HDBManager manager)
      Displays all applications submitted to the projects managed by the given manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager viewing submitted applications.

    • handleUpdateApplication

      public void handleUpdateApplication(HDBManager manager)
      Allows the manager to approve or reject pending BTO applications. Approval is based on flat availability, and approved applications will decrement the available flat count.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager updating the application statuses.

    • handleProcessWithdrawal

      public void handleProcessWithdrawal(HDBManager manager)
      Processes withdrawal requests submitted by applicants for the manager's projects. The manager may approve or reject each request.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager handling withdrawal requests.

    • viewAllEnquiries

      public void viewAllEnquiries()
      Displays all enquiries submitted across all projects in the system, regardless of project ownership or visibility.

    • replyToEnquiries

      public void replyToEnquiries(HDBManager manager)
      Allows the manager to reply to pending enquiries related to their own projects. Only unreplied enquiries can be selected and responded to.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager replying to their project's enquiries.

    • generateReports

      public void generateReports(HDBManager manager)
      Generates and displays reports related to applicant bookings. The manager can choose to apply filters such as marital status or flat type.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager generating and filtering reports.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(HDBManager manager)
      Allows the manager to update their password by invoking the password utility.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager whose password will be changed.
